title: Adventure Locations Music - Cities, Towns and Locations (33 tracks!)
description: Adventure-themed location music ranging from epic cities, to intimate towns, to enchanting forests this music pack will add life to all of the locations in your adventure game.
longDescription:
Welcome to my "Fantasy Cities and Towns and other Locations" music pack!


AUDIO PREVIEWS:

SoundCloud

YouTube


Summary:

Inside this pack you will find 33 unique tracks reaching over 1 hour and 25 minutes (not including multiple song versions). Using both live instrument recordings, as well as virtual instruments I hope to bring in truly fantastical music into your game to take your players to other worlds. Every track in this pack is filled with orchestral and medeival instruments to really bring that fantasy element to life.


Genre/feel:

These tracks have a wide spread in feel, from the soft and inimate town themes, to vast and epic cities and landscapes, to special themed locations, to dark and evil places, and more. I am horrible at naming tracks, however I tried to name them in an obvious way of what I intended when making the track. However, most if not all of these tracks can be used in multiple scenarios stretching far past a city town or location.


Why this pack?!

I am a professional composer who has had music on national television shows from The Bachelor to Backyard Bar Wars. This means that each track is professionally composed, mixed, and mastered to guarantee the highest quality sound for your game. Each track has carefully crafted melody and harmony to ensure interest and repeatability in your game so the track never gets old.


LOOPABLE:

Each track in this pack loops perfectly. Reverb tails were carefully added to each track to ensure that all tracks will loop perfectly and seamlessly with no cracks or pops.



I personally guarantee your satisfaction with these tracks and hope you enjoy the music as much as I enjoyed making it for you.


*All updates will be free after your first purchase!*


Art brought to you by: Yoosin Art || IG: yoosinart


Please contact me with any questions:

dkcompose@gmail.com
